Kufri.title: Kufri
Kufri.byline: Kufri is a tiny hill station in Southern Himachal Pradesh, India.

Kufstein.title: Kufstein
Kufstein.byline: Kufstein is a city in the Austrian state of Tyrol with a population of about 20,000 inhabitants, making it the second largest city in Tyrol after its capital Innsbruck.
